gather-lists-collection-owner: Label for owner of collection on list of all collections
gather-lists-collection-title: Label for title of collection on list of all collections
gather-lists-collection-description: Label for description of collection on list of all collections
gather-lists-collection-count: Label for count of collection on list of all collections
gather-edit-collection-label-name:
Label above input field for name of collection
{{Identical|Name}}
gather-edit-collection-label-description:
Label above input field for description of collection
{{Identical|Description}}
gather-edit-collection-label-privacy: Label next to checkbox for making collection private.
gather-edit-collection-save-label:
Label for save button in collection editor.
{{Identical|Done}}
gather-edit-collection-failed-error: There was a problem saving the changes.
gather-delete-collection-confirm: Text under the heading asking the user if they would like to delete a collection.
gather-delete-collection-delete-label:
Label for delete button in delete overlay.
{{Identical|Delete}}
gather-delete-collection-cancel-label:
Label for cancel button in delete overlay.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
gather-delete-collection-success: Toast message indicating that deletion was successful.
gather-delete-collection-failed-error: Toast error indicating there was a problem deleting the collection.
gather-error-unknown-collection: Error message test when you try to edit a collection you do not own or that does not exist.
gather-collection-member: Alternative text displayed next to collection name when page is a member.
gather-collection-non-member: Alternative text displayed next to collection name when page is not a member.
gather-anon-cta: Message that shows to anonymous users when they click the add to collection button.
gather-create-new-button-label:
Label for a button that is used to create a new collection.
{{Identical|Create}}
gather-add-new-placeholder: Placeholder text for input field for new collection.
gather-add-to-new: Heading that shows in the watchstar content overlay above a form to create a new collection.
gather-add-to-existing: Heading that shows in the watchstar content overlay above a list of your existing collections.
gather-add-toast:
Message displayed when you add an item to a collection. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-new-collection-failed-toast:
Message displayed when creating a new collection fails. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-add-failed-toast:
Message displayed when adding an item to a collection fails. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-add-to-collection-summary:
Text for a tutorial overlay presented to a user the first time they see the collections watchstar asking them if they would like to add the current page to a collection.

Parameters:
* $1 - page title
gather-add-to-collection-confirm: Label for button that user can click if they would like to add the current page to a collection
gather-add-to-collection-cancel:
Label for button that user can click if they do not want to add to a collection.
{{Identical|No thanks}}
gather-remove-toast:
Message displayed when you remove an item from a collection. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-no-public-lists-title:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
  The title of the view shown when there are no public collections for a user
gather-no-public-lists-description:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
  The descriptive text explaining that there are no public collections for a user.
gather-page-not-found:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
  Text in place of the collection excerpt explaining that the page does not exist
gather-anon-view-lists:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
 Text shown when trying to see your own collections on [[Special:Gather]] but the user is not logged in.
gather-watchlist-description:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
 Default description for special casing the Watchlist collection on the [[Special:Gather]] page.
gather-article-count:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
 Expression of the number of articles in a collection. Parameter:
* $1 - number of articles in the collection
{{Identical|Article}}
gather-empty:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
 Message shown on an empty rendered collection on [[Special:Gather]].
gather-empty-footer:
Note: Experimental feature. Messages and UI may change radically at any time. Translate at your own risk.
 Footnote shown on an empty rendered collection on [[Special:Gather]].
gather-edit-button:
Label for a button that enables editing a collection.
{{Identical|Edit}}
gather-delete-button:
Label for a button that enables deleting a collection.
{{Identical|Delete}}
